name: ORGAN GRINDER
description:
Our entry for Ludum Dare 52. 

  • WASD to move, space to jump.
  • Left mouse to shoot
  • 1-5 for weapons.
  • E to purchase UPGRADES (purple flame) and AMMO (orange flame)
  • P to cheat in a bunch of resources if the drop rate is too low for your liking. It didn’t get much balancing.

Harvest the organs of the organ harvesting skeletons and fight them back before they invade our reality.

With enough collected organs and a bit of luck, you can purchase upgrades to make the fight easier. The offered upgrades and locations changes every 2 minutes. Keep an eye out for the purple beacons

  • Crosshairs
  • Move speed
  • Jump height
  • Air control
  • More damage
  • Faster firing rate
  • Enemy HP bars
  • Upgrade locations
  • Impact explosives
  • More HP
  • Damage Reduction
